name: tcell-agent
description: Providing tCell protection to your NodeJS application
readme:
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/tcellio/nodeagent-tcell.svg?token=19hbLWnVryoenCQrueUn&branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/tcellio/nodeagent-tcell) [![js-standard-style](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-standard-brightgreen.svg)](http://standardjs.com/) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/tcellio/nodeagent-tcell/badge.svg?branch=master&service=github&t=XTurPl)](https://coveralls.io/github/tcellio/nodeagent-tcell?branch=master)  [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/dt/tcell-agent.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/tcell-agent)

tCell.io agent for NodeJS

# Installation
```bash 
npm install tcell-agent
```

To get a config file, you could either go to tcell admin panel, or you could copy the following json, change the app_id and api_key, and save it to a file with name *tcell_agent.config*
```json
{
  "version": 1,
  "applications": [
    {
      "app_id": "",
      "api_key": "",
      "tcell_api_url": "https://api.tcell.io/api/v1",
      "tcell_input_url": "https://input.tcell.io/api/v1"
    }
  ]
 }
```
Move the config file to your application root directory. (For more config options, check the tcell_agent.config file in the nodeagent-tcell folder)

In your main nodejs startup file, add the following line at the top:
```javascript
require('tcell-agent');
```

NOTE: If you are using New Relic, add the `require('tcell-agent');` line right after `require('newrelic')`.

Start/Restart your application.

# Release notes
- 0.2.8: Improved dependency finder also fixed bug where sometimes no dependencies were found. More Express route support. [More details](https://github.com/tcellio/nodeagent-tcell/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- 0.2.7: Two bugfixes. [More details](https://github.com/tcellio/nodeagent-tcell/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- 0.2.6: Libinjection for injection matching, config improvements, Ip blocking based on App Firewall matches, and lots more. [More details](https://github.com/tcellio/nodeagent-tcell/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) 
- 0.2.5: Several fixes and event schema updates.
- 0.2.4: Express 3.5 support.
- 0.2.1: Exclude routes. CSRF on by default. Multiple minor fixes.
- 0.2.0: Appsensor V2. IP Blocking feature. Passport instrumentation (passport-local). RouteID in CSP report-uri. CSRF detection (not tested enough so it is off by default)
- 0.1.8: Add transactionId to CSP report uri. Fix version string when not using config file.
- 0.1.7: Remove values from querystrings in appsensor events. Several minor bugfixes.
- 0.1.6: Bug fix in JSAgent injection for Express. Added more debug logging.
- 0.1.5: Look for bower dependencies. Clickjacking and HTTP Redirect features added.
- 0.1.4: AppSensor has the option to attach unencrypted payloads to pattern matched events. Environment variables for setting APP_ID, API_KEY, and more.
- 0.1.3: Add support for Node v5.x. TCell directory for logs and cache. Session instrumentation. Several bug fixes
- 0.1.2: Route Metrics (reporting response times, and session id's). More App sensors (sqli, xss, and more). Experimental cluster support.
- 0.1.1: AppSensor response codes. Experimental JSAgent injection for express (only for non static-file routes). More error handling and more configurable items.
- 0.1.0: Initial release
